title: Development of an OER-Based Mobile Microlearning Course for Science Subjects

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational scientific concepts and basic proficiency in using digital devices
context.additional_context: Science literacy enhancement program for working professionals, linking OER (Open Educational Resources) and library resources to provide cost-free learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can independently explore and utilize core science resources on OER platforms.
Learners can complete OER-based learning modules through collaborative problem-solving in mobile environments.
Learners achieve over 80% proficiency in applying science concepts using OER-integrated assessment tools.

resources: Access to OER (Open Educational Resources) databases
OER Curation Tool for Science Disciplines
Digital Resource Integration System for Libraries

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
